category.title: Vacant Buildings
category.description: Buildings with significant vacant residential or commercial space - sealed windows and doors, stalled construction with out-of-date permits, etc

category.title: Vacant Lots
category.description: Empty lots with no current construction, including ones being used informally as illegal parking garages or dumping sites.

category.title: Empty Condos
category.description: Condominiums with 50% or more units vacant, including condos under construction where work has stopped due to lack of funds....

category.title: vacant apt but occupied mixed use
category.description: e.g. open store on ground floor, vacant apartments above

category.title: Empty Condos
category.description: Condominiums with 50% or more units vacant, including condos under construction where work has stopped due to lack of funds....
